verses.verse: וַיִּצָּעֵק֙ <S%H6817><s%> gathered themselves together אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And the men אֶפְרַ֔יִם <S%H669><s%> of Ephraim וַֽיַּעֲבֹ֖ר <S%H5674><s%> and went צָפ֑וֹנָה <S%H6828><s%> northward וַיֹּאמְר֨וּ <S%H559><s%> and said לְיִפְתָּ֜ח <S%H3316><s%> unto Jephthah מַדּ֣וּעַ ׀ <S%H4069><s%> Why עָבַ֣רְתָּ ׀ <S%H5674><s%> Wherefore passedst thou over לְהִלָּחֵ֣ם <S%H3898><s%> to fight בִּבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> against the children עַמּ֗וֹן <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon וְלָ֙נוּ֙ לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> without קָרָ֙אתָ֙ <S%H7121><s%> and didst not call לָלֶ֣כֶת <S%H1980><s%> to go עִמָּ֔ךְ <S%H5973><s%> with בֵּיתְךָ֕ <S%H1004><s%> thine house נִשְׂרֹ֥ף <S%H8313><s%> with thee? we will burn עָלֶ֖יךָ <S%H5921><s%> upon בָּאֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H784><s%> upon thee with fire

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יִפְתָּח֙ <S%H3316><s%> And Jephthah אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> about אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> he רִ֗יב <S%H7379><s%> strife הָיִ֛יתִי <S%H1961><s%> were אֲנִ֛י <S%H589><s%> I וְעַמִּ֥י <S%H5971><s%> unto them I and my people וּבְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> with the children עַמּ֖וֹן <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> at great וָאֶזְעַ֣ק <S%H2199><s%> and when I called אֶתְכֶ֔ם <S%H853><s%> וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not הוֹשַׁעְתֶּ֥ם <S%H3467><s%> you ye delivered אוֹתִ֖י <S%H853><s%> מִיָּדָֽם׃ <S%H3027><s%> me not out of their hands

וָֽאֶרְאֶ֞ה <S%H7200><s%> And when I saw כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אֵינְךָ֣ <S%H369><s%> not מוֹשִׁ֗יעַ <S%H3467><s%> that ye delivered וָאָשִׂ֨ימָה <S%H7760><s%> [me] not I put נַפְשִׁ֤י <S%H5315><s%> my life בְכַפִּי֙ <S%H3709><s%> in my hands וָֽאֶעְבְּרָה֙ <S%H5674><s%> and passed over אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> against the children עַמּ֔וֹן <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon וַיִּתְּנֵ֥ם <S%H5414><s%> delivered יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD בְּיָדִ֑י <S%H3027><s%> them into my hand וְלָמָ֞ה <S%H4100><s%> Why עֲלִיתֶ֥ם <S%H5927><s%> wherefore then are ye come up אֵלַ֛י <S%H413><s%> against הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> unto me this day הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> this לְהִלָּ֥חֶם <S%H3898><s%> to fight בִּֽי׃

וַיִּקְבֹּ֤ץ <S%H6908><s%> gathered together יִפְתָּח֙ <S%H3316><s%> Then Jephthah אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אַנְשֵׁ֣י <S%H376><s%> the men גִלְעָ֔ד <S%H1568><s%> of Gilead וַיִּלָּ֖חֶם <S%H3898><s%> and fought אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for אֶפְרָ֑יִם <S%H669><s%> with Ephraim וַיַּכּוּ֩ <S%H5221><s%> smote אַנְשֵׁ֨י <S%H376><s%> and the men גִלְעָ֜ד <S%H1568><s%> of Gilead אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֶפְרַ֗יִם <S%H669><s%> Ephraim כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> because אָמְרוּ֙ <S%H559><s%> because they said פְּלִיטֵ֤י <S%H6412><s%> [are] fugitives אֶפְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H669><s%> of Ephraim אַתֶּ֔ם <S%H859><s%> O גִּלְעָ֕ד <S%H1568><s%> Ye Gileadites בְּת֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> among אֶפְרַ֖יִם <S%H669><s%> the Ephraimites בְּת֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> [and] among מְנַשֶּֽׁה׃ <S%H4519><s%> the Manassites

וַיִּלְכֹּ֥ד <S%H3920><s%> took גִּלְעָ֛ד <S%H1568><s%> And the Gileadites אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> מַעְבְּר֥וֹת <S%H4569><s%> the passages הַיַּרְדֵּ֖ן <S%H3383><s%> of Jordan לְאֶפְרָ֑יִם <S%H669><s%> before the Ephraimites וְֽ֠הָיָה <S%H1961><s%> happened כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> when יֹאמְר֞וּ <S%H559><s%> said פְּלִיטֵ֤י <S%H6412><s%> which were escaped אֶפְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H669><s%> and it was [so] that when those Ephraimites אֶעֱבֹ֔רָה <S%H5674><s%> Let me go over וַיֹּ֨אמְרוּ <S%H559><s%> said ל֧וֹ אַנְשֵֽׁי־ <S%H582><s%> that the men גִלְעָ֛ד <S%H1568><s%> of Gilead הַֽאֶפְרָתִ֥י <S%H673><s%> Ephraimite אַ֖תָּה <S%H859><s%> you וַיֹּ֥אמֶֽר ׀ <S%H559><s%> say לֹֽא׃ <S%H3808><s%> No

וַיֹּ֣אמְרוּ <S%H559><s%> Then said לוֹ֩ אֱמָר־ <S%H559><s%> they unto him Say נָ֨א <S%H4994><s%> I beseech thee שִׁבֹּ֜לֶת <S%H7641><s%> now Shibboleth וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and he said סִבֹּ֗לֶת <S%H5451><s%> Sibboleth וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not יָכִין֙ <S%H3559><s%> [it] right לְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> to pronounce כֵּ֔ן <S%H3651><s%> after that וַיֹּאחֲז֣וּ <S%H270><s%> Then they took אוֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> וַיִּשְׁחָט֖וּהוּ <S%H7819><s%> him and slew אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> at מַעְבְּר֣וֹת <S%H4569><s%> him at the passages הַיַּרְדֵּ֑ן <S%H3383><s%> of Jordan וַיִּפֹּ֞ל <S%H5307><s%> and there fell בָּעֵ֤ת <S%H6256><s%> at that time הַהִיא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he מֵֽאֶפְרַ֔יִם <S%H669><s%> of the Ephraimites אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <S%H705><s%> forty וּשְׁנַ֖יִם <S%H8147><s%> and two אָֽלֶף׃ <S%H505><s%> thousand

וַיִּשְׁפֹּ֥ט <S%H8199><s%> judged יִפְתָּ֛ח <S%H3316><s%> And Jephthah אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel שֵׁ֣שׁ <S%H8337><s%> six שָׁנִ֑ים <S%H8141><s%> years וַיָּ֗מָת <S%H4191><s%> Then died יִפְתָּח֙ <S%H3316><s%> Jephthah הַגִּלְעָדִ֔י <S%H1569><s%> the Gileadite וַיִּקָּבֵ֖ר <S%H6912><s%> and was buried בְּעָרֵ֥י <S%H5892><s%> in [one of] the cities גִלְעָֽד׃ <S%H1568><s%> of Gilead פ
וַיִּשְׁפֹּ֤ט <S%H8199><s%> judged אַֽחֲרָיו֙ <S%H310><s%> And after אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel אִבְצָ֖ן <S%H78><s%> him Ibzan מִבֵּ֥ית לָֽחֶם׃ <S%H1035><s%> of Bethlehem

וַיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> had ל֞וֹ שְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <S%H7970><s%> And he had thirty בָּנִ֗ים <S%H1121><s%> sons וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֤ים <S%H7970><s%> and thirty בָּנוֹת֙ <S%H1323><s%> daughters שִׁלַּ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> [whom] he sent הַח֔וּצָה <S%H2351><s%> abroad וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <S%H7970><s%> in thirty בָּנ֔וֹת <S%H1323><s%> daughters הֵבִ֥יא <S%H935><s%> and took לְבָנָ֖יו <S%H1121><s%> for his sons מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַח֑וּץ <S%H2351><s%> from abroad וַיִּשְׁפֹּ֥ט <S%H8199><s%> And he judged אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel שֶׁ֥בַע <S%H7651><s%> seven שָׁנִֽים׃ <S%H8141><s%> years
וַיָּ֣מָת <S%H4191><s%> Then died אִבְצָ֔ן <S%H78><s%> Ibzan וַיִּקָּבֵ֖ר <S%H6912><s%> and was buried בְּבֵ֥ית לָֽחֶם׃ <S%H1035><s%> at Bethlehem פ

וַיִּשְׁפֹּ֤ט <S%H8199><s%> judged אַֽחֲרָיו֙ <S%H310><s%> And after אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel אֵיל֖וֹן <S%H356><s%> him Elon הַזְּבֽוּלֹנִ֑י <S%H2075><s%> a Zebulonite וַיִּשְׁפֹּ֥ט <S%H8199><s%> and he judged אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel עֶ֥שֶׂר <S%H6235><s%> ten שָׁנִֽים׃ <S%H8141><s%> years

וַיָּ֖מָת <S%H4191><s%> died אֵל֣וֹן <S%H436><s%> the oak הַזְּבֽוּלֹנִ֑י <S%H2075><s%> the Zebulonite וַיִּקָּבֵ֥ר <S%H6912><s%> and was buried בְּאַיָּל֖וֹן <S%H357><s%> in Aijalon בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the country זְבוּלֻֽן׃ <S%H2074><s%> of Zebulun פ

וַיִּשְׁפֹּ֥ט <S%H8199><s%> judged אַחֲרָ֖יו <S%H310><s%> And after אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel עַבְדּ֥וֹן <S%H5658><s%> him Abdon בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son הִלֵּ֖ל <S%H1985><s%> of Hillel הַפִּרְעָתוֹנִֽי׃ <S%H6553><s%> a Pirathonite

וַיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> had ל֞וֹ אַרְבָּעִ֣ים <S%H705><s%> And he had forty בָּנִ֗ים <S%H1121><s%> sons וּשְׁלֹשִׁים֙ <S%H7970><s%> and thirty בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> grandsons בָנִ֔ים <S%H1121><s%> sons רֹכְבִ֖ים <S%H7392><s%> that rode עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on שִׁבְעִ֣ים <S%H7657><s%> on threescore and ten עֲיָרִ֑ם <S%H5895><s%> ass colts וַיִּשְׁפֹּ֥ט <S%H8199><s%> and he judged אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel שְׁמֹנֶ֥ה <S%H8083><s%> eight שָׁנִֽים׃ <S%H8141><s%> years

וַיָּ֛מָת <S%H4191><s%> died עַבְדּ֥וֹן <S%H5658><s%> And Abdon בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son הִלֵּ֖ל <S%H1985><s%> of Hillel הַפִּרְעָתוֹנִ֑י <S%H6553><s%> the Pirathonite וַיִּקָּבֵ֤ר <S%H6912><s%> and was buried בְּפִרְעָתוֹן֙ <S%H6552><s%> in Pirathon בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land אֶפְרַ֔יִם <S%H669><s%> of Ephraim בְּהַ֖ר <S%H2022><s%> in the mount הָעֲמָלֵקִֽי׃ <S%H6003><s%> of the Amalekites פ
